messages.title: Serving the community for the last 20 years

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Campaign for more police patrolling the street and help youth engagement programs to help deter youth from getting involved in anti-social behaviour activities.
Address issues around service housing with the rising number of waiting list in London boroughs. Providing the right housing that people are so desperate for.
Reduce truancy, introduce smaller classes and provide talented and specialist teachers to give children access to the kind of education they deserve.
Change the high rate of unemployment in Tower Hamlets, especially for those under 25. Must get skilled local people into work, especially through the Olympics and its legacy.

issues.education: Stop violence in the classrooms, introduce small classes, provide talented and specialist teachers to ensure our children access to the kind of education they deserve.

housing.content: Address issues around service housing with the rising number of waiting list in London boroughs. Providing the right housing that people are so desperate for.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have been happily married to Rahima for nearly 18 years and have 3 wonderful children. Our eldest daughter is 16 years old, our son is 11 and youngest daughter is 5.

politicalExperience.role: Public Affairs department for Canary Wharf Group
politicalExperience.achievements: Worked for Canary Wharf Group on projects for the local sector. Went on to work for Canary Wharf Group as Sports Development Manager and was promoted to Head of Community Affairs a few years later.

contactInformation.address: Docklands Business Centre, 10-16 Tiller Road, London E14 8PX

images.caption: Zakir Khan with Boris Johnson and other political figures.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Promoted by Adrian Thompson, on behalf of Zakir Khan. Printed by LiquiPrint.
